headline.main: KNOX SAYS ARMING HASTENS VICTORY; Guns in Variety Are Reported Available and Crews Have Been in Training a Year

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 13 -- The Navy is ready to proceed immediately with the arming of American merchant ships, a state of preparedness stressed tonight alike by Secretary Knox and spokesmen for naval operating executives immediately after the House approved Senate amendments further revising the Neutrality Act.
abstract: stresses new merchant fleet and manpower
